explicit.modelviews

Class ModelView

  • java.lang.Object
    • explicit.modelviews.ModelView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DTMCView, MDPView

    public abstract class ModelView
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model
    Base class for an DTMCView or MDPView, handling common tasks.

        public int getFirstDeadlockState()

        Specified by:
        isDeadlockState in interface Model

      • findDeadlocks

        public void findDeadlocks(boolean fix)
                   throws PrismException
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Find all deadlock states and store this information in the model. If requested (if fix=true) and if needed (i.e. for DTMCs/CTMCs), fix deadlocks by adding self-loops in these states. The set of deadlocks (before any possible fixing) can be obtained from Model.getDeadlockStates().
        Specified by:
        findDeadlocks in interface Model
        Throws:
        PrismException - if the model is unable to fix deadlocks because it is non-mutable.

      • getPredecessorRelation

        public PredecessorRelation getPredecessorRelation(PrismComponent parent,
                                                  boolean storeIfNew)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        If there is a PredecessorRelation stored for this model, return that. Otherwise, create one and return that. If storeIfNew, store it for later use.
        Specified by:
        getPredecessorRelation in interface Model
        Parameters:
        parent - a PrismComponent (for obtaining the log)
        storeIfNew - if the predecessor relation is newly created, store it

      • isVirtual

        public boolean isVirtual()
        Tell whether the receiver is a virtual or explicit model. Virtual models may impose a significant overhead on any computations.
        Returns:
        true iff model is a virtual model
